titles.title: A Better Person I'd Like To Be

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
A better person I'd like to be,
A vessel of honor for the world to see.
Just clay am I in my Master's hand,
Willing to be what my Lord commands.
Chorus:
I will not resist the Potter's hand,
I will not resist the Potter's hand,
For He is fashioning and forming me.
He's changing me, He heard my plea,
He's changing me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
But when the trials and testings come,
I start to fight and I try to run.
Lord, help me know you've just begun
To mould this clay to reveal Your Son.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I'll yield to Him whate'er the cost,
For life is more than gain or loss.
It matters not how rich I am,
Only if I'm yielded fully to His plan.
